title: MC_ReadBoolParameter (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK MC_ReadBoolParameter
MC_ReadBoolParameter
returns the value of the SoftMotion parameter
specified in input
ParameterNumber
.
The boolean variable
Value
contains the read value.

rows.Name: Enable
rows.Comment:
TRUE: Enables the execution of the function block.
WhileTRUE, the outputvalueprovides the parameter
value continuously for reading out.

rows:
You can find a description of the most used parameter numbers inAXIS_REF_SM3.
Negative values are fieldbus specific parameters.
SeeSMC_ParameterNumber_CoEandSMC_ParameterNumber_SoEto translate fieldbus object identifiers to parameter numbers.

TRUE: Execution of the function block has not finished
yet.
TRUE: Error has occurred during execution.

Boolean value of the parameter specified in
input``ParameterNumber``.
